Title: UnZip: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in UnZip, the worst of
    which could result in the execution of arbitrary code.

Background.Text: Info-ZIPâ€™s UnZip is a tool to list and extract files inside PKZIP compressed files.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in UnZip. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted ZIP archive using UnZip, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All UnZip users should upgrade to the latest version:
